spell_tooltip.description: Bestial Wrath now provides immunity to Fear and Horror effects for you and your pets for 8 sec. Nearby allied pets are also inspired, increasing their attack speed by 10%.
Feign Death reduces damage taken by 90% for 2 sec.
Call of the Wild additionally summons a slow moving basilisk near your target for 30 sec that attacks the target for heavy damage.
Every 10 Focus you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Exhilaration by 1.5 sec.
Disengage also frees you from all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 50% for 4 sec.
You attempt to finish off a wounded target, dealing 408,742 Physical damage. Only usable on enemies with less than 20% health.
Maximum health increased by 8%, and Exhilaration now also heals you for an additional 12.0% of your maximum health over 8 sec.
Damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 5%.

Kill Command has a 10% chance to grant Deathblow.

 Deathblow
The cooldown of Kill Shot is reset. Your next Kill Shot can be used on any target, regardless of their current health.

Natural Mending now reduces the cooldown of Exhilaration by an additional 0.5 sec

Mend Pet heals for an additional 25% of your pet's health over its duration, and has a 25% chance to dispel a magic effect each time it heals your pet.

Removes 1 Enrage and 1 Magic effect from an enemy target.

Successfully dispelling an effect generates 10 Focus.
Reduces all damage you and your pet take by 30% for 8 sec.
Interrupts spellcasting, preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Misdirects all threat you cause to the targeted party or raid member, beginning with your next attack within 30 sec and lasting for 8 sec.
Survival of the Fittest gains an additional charge.

Reduce the cooldown of Survival of the Fittest by 30 sec, and increase its duration by 2.0 sec.

Reduce the cooldown of Counter Shot and Muzzle by 2 sec.
Wildfire Bomb deals 10% increased damage.
When Tranquilizing Shot successfully dispels an effect or Muzzle interrupts a cast, gain 10 Focus.
Commands your pet to intimidate the target, stunning it for 5 sec.
Fires an explosive shot at your target. After 3 sec, the shot will explode, dealing 520,461 Fire damage to all enemies within 8 yds. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Fires a magical projectile, tethering the enemy and any other enemies within 5 yds for 10 sec, stunning them for 3 sec if they move more than 5 yds from the arrow.

You and your pet have 5.0% increased attack speed.

This effect is increased by 100% if you do not have an active pet.
The damage of Explosive Shot is increased by 8%.
Critical strike chance increased by 4%.
Binding Shot's stun duration is increased by 1 sec.
Movement speed increased by 4%.
You and your pet blend into the surroundings and gain stealth for 1 min. While camouflaged, you will heal for 2% of maximum health every 1 sec.
Your movement speed is increased by 30% anytime you have not attacked for 3 sec.
You gain 5% more critical strike from critical strike sources.
Reduces the cooldowns of Aspect of the Eagle, Aspect of the Cheetah, and Aspect of the Turtle by 30 sec.
Feign Death and Aspect of the Turtle removes poison and disease effects from you.
Hurls a fire trap to the target location that explodes when an enemy approaches, causing 51,757 Fire damage and knocking all enemies up. Limit 1. Trap will exist for 1 min.

Your damage over time effects deal 10% increased damage.

This effect is increased by 50% on targets below 20% health.
Give the command to kill, causing your pet to savagely deal 93,689 Physical damage to the enemy.

A quick shot causing 167,871 Physical damage.

Reduces the cooldown of Kill Command by 1 sec.
Your Call Pet additionally summons the pet from the bonus slot in your stable. This pet will obey your Kill Command, but cannot use pet family abilities.

Fire a shot that tears through your enemy, causing them to bleed for 383,679 damage over 12 sec.

Sends your pet into a frenzy, increasing attack speed by 30% for 12 sec, stacking up to 3 times.

Generates 20 Focus over 8 sec.
Passive Focus generation increased by 125%.
Barbed Shot deals 10% increased damage, and applying Barbed Shot has a 50% chance to reset the cooldown of Kill Command.
Barbed Shot increases your critical strike chance by 2% for 12 sec, stacking up to 3 times.
Kill Command deals increased critical strike damage equal to 100% of your critical strike chance.
Fires several missiles, hitting all nearby enemies within 8 yds of your current target for 81,951 Physical damage. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
When your pet attacks critically strike, they cause their target to bleed for 8% of the damage dealt over 6 sec.
Kill Command now has 2 charges, and deals 15% increased damage.
After you Multi-Shot, your pet's melee attacks also strike all nearby enemies for 80% of the damage for the next 6.0 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Your auto shot critical strikes have a 20% chance to reset the cooldown of Barbed Shot.

Direct damage from Barbed Shot has a 30% chance to explode on impact, applying Serpent Sting and dealing 128,720 Nature damage to nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 targets.

 Serpent Sting
Fire a shot that poisons your target, causing them to take 38,771 Nature damage instantly and an additional 255,283 Nature damage over 18 sec.
When you cast Barbed Shot, your pet stomps the ground, dealing 70,540 Physical damage to its primary target and 70,126 Physical damage to all other nearby enemies.
While Beast Cleave is active, Kill Command now also strikes nearby enemies for 80% of damage dealt. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
All pet damage dealt increased by 5%.
Kill Command damage is increased by 10%. Barbed Shot lasts 2.0 sec longer.

Sends you and your pet into a rage, instantly dealing 127,516 Physical damage to its target, and increasing all damage you both deal by 30% for 15 sec. Removes all crowd control effects from your pet.
Kill Command has a 20% chance to also summon a Dire Beast to attack your target for 8 sec.
Kill Command deals 50% increased damage against enemies below 35% health.
Barbed Shot reduces the cooldown of Bestial Wrath by 12.0 sec.
Dire Beast lasts an additional 2 sec and deals 60% increased damage.

You sound the call of the wild, summoning 2 of your active pets for 20 sec. During this time, a random pet from your stable will appear every 4 sec to assault your target for 6 sec. 

Each time Call of the Wild summons a pet, the cooldown of Barbed Shot and Kill Command are reduced by 25%.
Activating Bestial Wrath grants 2 charges of Barbed Shot.
While Call of the Wild is active, your pets have the effects of Beast Cleave, and each time Call of the Wild summons a pet, all of your pets Stomp.
While Bestial Wrath is active, your pet's critical damage dealt is increased by 35%.

While in combat, every 25 sec your next Kill Command summons the aid of a Beast.

 Wyvern
A Wyvern descends from the skies, letting out a battle cry that increases the damage of you and your pets by 15% for 15 sec.

 Boar
A Boar charges through your target 3 times, dealing 430,850 physical damage to the primary target and 172,371 damage to up to 8 nearby enemies.

 Bear
A Bear leaps into the fray, rending the flesh of your enemies, dealing 759,339 damage over 10 sec to up to 8 nearby enemies.

Howl of the Pack Leader causes your Kill Command to generate an additional stack of Tip of the Spear.

Summoning a Beast reduces the cooldown of Wildfire Bomb by 10.0 sec.

Kill Command reduces the cooldown of Howl of the Pack Leader by 2.0 sec.

Raptor Strike reduces the cooldown of Howl of the Pack Leader by 1.0 sec.

Howl of the Pack Leader's cooldown is reduced to 25 sec.

Your pets gain an extra 5% of your attack power.
Your Bear's periodic damage has a 10% chance to reduce the cooldown of Butchery or Flanking Strike by 2.0 sec.

Your pet's attacks increase your Wyvern's damage bonus by 1%, up to 10%.

Casting Wildfire Bomb extends the duration of your Wyvern by 5.0 sec, up to 10 additional sec.

Summoning your Boar refreshes the duration of Mongoose Fury.

Each time your Boar deals damage, you have a 25% chance to gain a stack of Mongoose Fury and Raptor Strike strikes 1 additional target. Stacks up to 4 times.

Mongoose Fury
Increases the damage of Mongoose Bite or Raptor Strike by 15% for 16 sec, stacking up to 5 times.

Damage from your Kill Shot sends your pets into a rage, causing all active pets within 20 yds and your Bear to pounce to the target and Smack, Claw, or Bite it.

Your pets will not leap if their target is already in melee range.

When dropping below 60% health, summon the aid of a Turtle, reducing the damage you take by 10% for 6 sec.

This effect can only occur once every 1.5 min.
When Disengage removes a movement impairing effect, its cooldown is reduced by 4 sec.
Casting Coordinated Assault grants Howl of the Pack Leader and increases the damage dealt by your Beasts by 25% and your pet by 30% for 12 sec.
Every 10 Focus you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Exhilaration by 1.5 sec.
Disengage also frees you from all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 50% for 4 sec.
You attempt to finish off a wounded target, dealing 418,995 Physical damage. Only usable on enemies with less than 20% health.
Maximum health increased by 8%, and Exhilaration now also heals you for an additional 12.0% of your maximum health over 8 sec.
Damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 5%.

Kill Command has a 10% chance to grant Deathblow.

 Deathblow
The cooldown of Kill Shot is reset. Your next Kill Shot can be used on any target, regardless of their current health.

Natural Mending now reduces the cooldown of Exhilaration by an additional 0.5 sec

Mend Pet heals for an additional 25% of your pet's health over its duration, and has a 25% chance to dispel a magic effect each time it heals your pet.

Removes 1 Enrage and 1 Magic effect from an enemy target.

Successfully dispelling an effect generates 10 Focus.
Reduces all damage you and your pet take by 30% for 8 sec.
Interrupts spellcasting, preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Misdirects all threat you cause to the targeted party or raid member, beginning with your next attack within 30 sec and lasting for 8 sec.
Survival of the Fittest gains an additional charge.

Reduce the cooldown of Survival of the Fittest by 30 sec, and increase its duration by 2.0 sec.

Reduce the cooldown of Counter Shot and Muzzle by 2 sec.
Wildfire Bomb deals 10% increased damage.

Fires an explosive shot at your target. After 3 sec, the shot will explode, dealing 508,416 Fire damage to all enemies within 8 yds. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Fires a magical projectile, tethering the enemy and any other enemies within 5 yds for 10 sec, stunning them for 3 sec if they move more than 5 yds from the arrow.

 Serpent Sting

While Beast Cleave is active, Kill Command now also strikes nearby enemies for 80% of damage dealt. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

This effect can only occur once every 1.5 min.

Casting Coordinated Assault grants Howl of the Pack Leader and increases the damage dealt by your Beasts by 25% and your pet by 30% for 12 sec.
Aspect of the Cheetah has 50% reduced cooldown and grants its effects to allies within 15 yds.
Victims of Freezing Trap can no longer be damaged or healed.  Freezing Trap is now undispellable, but has a 4 sec duration.

Instantly clears all bleeds, poisons, and diseases from the target, and heals for 18% damage over 6 sec.

Being attacked will stop you from using Mending Bandage.
Every 10 Focus you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Exhilaration by 1.5 sec.
Disengage also frees you from all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 50% for 4 sec.
You attempt to finish off a wounded target, dealing 509,320 Physical damage. Only usable on enemies with less than 20% health.
Maximum health increased by 8%, and Exhilaration now also heals you for an additional 12.0% of your maximum health over 8 sec.
Damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 5%.

Successfully dispelling an effect generates 10 Focus.
Reduces all damage you and your pet take by 30% for 8 sec.
Interrupts spellcasting, preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Tranquilizing Shot removes up to 1 additional Magic effect from up to 2 nearby targets.
Misdirects all threat you cause to the targeted party or raid member, beginning with your next attack within 30 sec and lasting for 8 sec.
Survival of the Fittest gains an additional charge.

Reduce the cooldown of Survival of the Fittest by 30 sec, and increase its duration by 2.0 sec.

This effect is increased by 100% if you do not have an active pet.
The damage of Explosive Shot is increased by 8%.
Critical strike chance increased by 4%.
Movement speed increased by 4%.

Your movement speed is increased by 30% anytime you have not attacked for 3 sec.
You gain 5% more critical strike from critical strike sources.
Reduces the cooldowns of Aspect of the Eagle, Aspect of the Cheetah, and Aspect of the Turtle by 30 sec.
Feign Death and Aspect of the Turtle removes poison and disease effects from you.
Hurls a fire trap to the target location that explodes when an enemy approaches, causing 50,984 Fire damage and knocking all enemies up. Limit 1. Trap will exist for 1 min.

Your damage over time effects deal 10% increased damage.

This effect is increased by 50% on targets below 20% health.

Give the command to kill, causing your pet to savagely deal 127,494 Physical damage to the enemy.

Kill Command has a 20% chance to immediately reset its cooldown.

Generates 15 Focus.

Hurl a bomb at the target, exploding for 190,791 Fire damage in a cone and coating enemies in wildfire, scorching them for 191,781 Fire damage over 6 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Deals 80% increased damage to your primary target.
A vicious slash dealing 431,859 Physical damage.
Wildfire Bomb now has 2 charges, and the initial explosion deals 50% increased damage.
Kill Command increases the direct damage of your other spells by 15%, stacking up to 3 times.
Auto-attacks with a two-handed weapon reduce the cooldown of Wildfire Bombs by 1.0 sec.
When you cast Kill Command, you have a 30% chance to fire an Arcane Shot at your target at 100% of normal value.

Kill Command has an additional 10% chance to immediately reset its cooldown.

Tip of the Spear's damage bonus is increased up to 30%, based on your critical strike chance.

Mongoose Bite and Raptor Strike have a 10% chance to reset Kill Command's cooldown.

Kill Command reduces the cooldown of Wildfire Bomb by 0.5 sec.

Quick Shot and auto-attacks with a two-handed weapon increase the direct damage of your next Wildfire Bomb by 4%, stacking up to 3 times.

Casting Coordinated Assault grants 3 stacks of Wildfire Arsenal.

Attack all nearby enemies in a flurry of strikes, inflicting 345,606 Physical damage to nearby enemies and 303,735 damage over 8 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Reduces the remaining cooldown on Wildfire Bomb by 3 sec for each target hit, up to 15.0 sec.
Kill Command now has 2 charges, and deals 15% increased damage.
Kill Shot, Serpent Sting, Arcane Shot, Steady Shot, and Explosive Shot deal 20% increased damage.

Wildfire Bomb deals 5% increased damage and has a 25% chance to reset the cooldown of Explosive Shot.

Explosive Shot reduces the cooldown of Wildfire Bomb by 2 sec.

Flanking Strike damage increased by 40% and Flanking Strike now increases your attack speed by 25% for 12 sec.

Butchery reduces the remaining cooldown on Wildfire Bomb by 3.0 sec for each target hit, up to 5 targets.

Enemies damaged by Flanking Strike bleed for an additional 607,471 damage over 8 sec.

Up to 5 enemies damaged by Butchery bleed for an additional 303,735 damage over 8 sec.

Raptor Strike and Mongoose Bite damage increased by 15%.

Raptor Strike and Mongoose Bite apply Serpent Sting to your target.

Serpent Sting
Fire a poison-tipped arrow at an enemy, dealing 34,538 Nature damage instantly and an additional 259,414 damage over 12 sec.

Kill Command causes the target to bleed for 39,004 damage over 8 sec.

You and your pet gain 10% attack speed for every bleeding enemy within 12 yds.
Damage of Flanking Strike and Butchery increased by 5% and all damage dealt by Wildfire Bomb increased by 5%.
Reapplying Serpent Sting to a target also spreads it to up to 4 enemies within 8 yds.
Each damage over time effect on a target increases the critical strike damage they receive from you by 2%.
Wildfire Bomb and Explosive Shot damage increased by 10.0%.
Raptor Strike, Mongoose Bite, and Butchery damage increased by 10%.

Furiously strikes all enemies in front of you, dealing 2.5 million Physical damage over 2.6 sec. Critical strike chance increased by 50% against any target below 20% health. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

You and your pet charge your enemy, striking them for a combined 342,650 Physical damage. You and your pet's bond is then strengthened for 20 sec, causing you and your pet to deal 20% increased damage.

While Coordinated Assault is active, Kill Command's chance to reset its cooldown is increased by 15%.

Fury of the Eagle's damage is increased by 10% and has a 20% chance to generate a stack of Tip of the Spear.

When Fury of the Eagle ends, your Haste is increased by 8%.
The cooldown of Coordinated Assault is reduced by 60 sec and Coordinated Assault now grants 3 stacks of Tip of the Spear.

When you cast Coordinated Assault, you gain 1 charge of Wildfire Bomb. 

When Coordinated Assault ends, Explosive Shot's cooldown is reset and your next Explosive Shot fires at 2 additional targets at 100% effectiveness.

Your attacks have a chance to apply Sentinel on the target, stacking up to 10 times.

While Sentinel stacks are higher than 3, applying Sentinel has a chance to trigger an implosion, causing a stack to be consumed on the target every sec to deal 84,328 Arcane damage.
Each time Sentinel deals damage to an enemy you gain an absorb shield equal to 1.0% of your maximum health, up to 10%.
When you apply Sentinel to a target not affected by Sentinel, you apply 1 additional stack.
Raptor Strike, Mongoose Bite and Wildfire Bomb deal 10% increased damage.
When you apply Sentinel on a target, you have a 15% chance to apply a second stack.
When Sentinel starts dealing damage, the target is snared by 40% for 3 sec.

Each time Sentinel deals damage to an enemy it has an up to 15% chance to generate 5 Focus.

Chances decrease with each additional Sentinel currently imploding applied to enemies.
Whenever a Sentinel deals damage, the cooldown of Coordinated Assault is reduced by 1 sec, up to 15 sec.
Multi-Shot and Butchery discharge arcane energy from all targets affected by your Sentinel, dealing 96,929 Arcane damage to up to 5 targets within 8 yds of your Sentinel targets.

All Sentinel debuffs implode when a target affected by more than 3 stacks of your Sentinel falls below 20% health.

This effect can only occur once every 15 sec per target.

Every 30 sec your next Wildfire Bomb launches a celestial arrow that conjures a 12 yd radius Lunar Storm at the target's location dealing 107,699 Arcane damage.
 
For the next 12 sec, a random enemy affected by Sentinel within your Lunar Storm gets struck for 100,968 Arcane damage every 0.4 sec. Any target struck by this effect takes 10% increased damage from you and your pet for 8 sec.
Every 10 Focus you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Exhilaration by 1.5 sec.
Disengage also frees you from all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 50% for 4 sec.
You attempt to finish off a wounded target, dealing 516,382 Physical damage. Only usable on enemies with less than 20% health.

Kill Command now has 2 charges, and deals 15% increased damage.
Kill Shot, Serpent Sting, Arcane Shot, Steady Shot, and Explosive Shot deal 20% increased damage.

Wildfire Bomb deals 5% increased damage and has a 25% chance to reset the cooldown of Explosive Shot.

Explosive Shot reduces the cooldown of Wildfire Bomb by 2 sec.

Flanking Strike damage increased by 40% and Flanking Strike now increases your attack speed by 25% for 12 sec.

Butchery reduces the remaining cooldown on Wildfire Bomb by 3.0 sec for each target hit, up to 5 targets.

Enemies damaged by Flanking Strike bleed for an additional 607,471 damage over 8 sec.

Up to 5 enemies damaged by Butchery bleed for an additional 303,735 damage over 8 sec.

Raptor Strike and Mongoose Bite damage increased by 15%.

Raptor Strike and Mongoose Bite apply Serpent Sting to your target.

Serpent Sting
Fire a poison-tipped arrow at an enemy, dealing 34,206 Nature damage instantly and an additional 259,414 damage over 12 sec.

Kill Command causes the target to bleed for 39,004 damage over 8 sec.

You and your pet gain 10% attack speed for every bleeding enemy within 12 yds.
Damage of Flanking Strike and Butchery increased by 5% and all damage dealt by Wildfire Bomb increased by 5%.
Reapplying Serpent Sting to a target also spreads it to up to 4 enemies within 8 yds.
Each damage over time effect on a target increases the critical strike damage they receive from you by 2%.
Wildfire Bomb and Explosive Shot damage increased by 10.0%.
Raptor Strike, Mongoose Bite, and Butchery damage increased by 10%.

Furiously strikes all enemies in front of you, dealing 2.5 million Physical damage over 2.6 sec. Critical strike chance increased by 50% against any target below 20% health. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

You and your pet charge your enemy, striking them for a combined 343,001 Physical damage. You and your pet's bond is then strengthened for 20 sec, causing you and your pet to deal 20% increased damage.

While Coordinated Assault is active, Kill Command's chance to reset its cooldown is increased by 15%.

Fury of the Eagle's damage is increased by 10% and has a 20% chance to generate a stack of Tip of the Spear.

When Fury of the Eagle ends, your Haste is increased by 8%.
The cooldown of Coordinated Assault is reduced by 60 sec and Coordinated Assault now grants 3 stacks of Tip of the Spear.

When you cast Coordinated Assault, you gain 1 charge of Wildfire Bomb. 

When Coordinated Assault ends, Explosive Shot's cooldown is reset and your next Explosive Shot fires at 2 additional targets at 100% effectiveness.
Each time Sentinel deals damage to an enemy you gain an absorb shield equal to 1.0% of your maximum health, up to 10%.
When you apply Sentinel to a target not affected by Sentinel, you apply 1 additional stack.
Raptor Strike, Mongoose Bite and Wildfire Bomb deal 10% increased damage.
When you apply Sentinel on a target, you have a 15% chance to apply a second stack.
When Sentinel starts dealing damage, the target is snared by 40% for 3 sec.

Each time Sentinel deals damage to an enemy it has an up to 15% chance to generate 5 Focus.

Chances decrease with each additional Sentinel currently imploding applied to enemies.
Whenever a Sentinel deals damage, the cooldown of Coordinated Assault is reduced by 1 sec, up to 15 sec.
Multi-Shot and Butchery discharge arcane energy from all targets affected by your Sentinel, dealing 96,929 Arcane damage to up to 5 targets within 8 yds of your Sentinel targets.

All Sentinel debuffs implode when a target affected by more than 3 stacks of your Sentinel falls below 20% health.

This effect can only occur once every 15 sec per target.

Every 30 sec your next Wildfire Bomb launches a celestial arrow that conjures a 12 yd radius Lunar Storm at the target's location dealing 107,699 Arcane damage.
 
For the next 12 sec, a random enemy affected by Sentinel within your Lunar Storm gets struck for 100,968 Arcane damage every 0.4 sec. Any target struck by this effect takes 10% increased damage from you and your pet for 8 sec.

Casting Aimed Shot provides you with Ranger's Finesse. After gaining 3 stacks of Ranger's Finesse, increase your next Volley's radius and duration by 50%.

Consuming Ranger's Finesse reduces the remaining cooldown of Aspect of the Turtle by 20 sec.
Aspect of the Cheetah has 50% reduced cooldown and grants its effects to allies within 15 yds.
Every 10 Focus you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Exhilaration by 1.5 sec.
Disengage also frees you from all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 50% for 4 sec.
You attempt to finish off a wounded target, dealing 414,152 Physical damage. Only usable on enemies with less than 20% health.
Maximum health increased by 8%, and Exhilaration now also heals you for an additional 12.0% of your maximum health over 8 sec.
Damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 5%.

Kill Command has a 10% chance to grant Deathblow.

 Deathblow
The cooldown of Kill Shot is reset. Your next Kill Shot can be used on any target, regardless of their current health.

Hurls a tar trap to the target location that creates a 8 yd radius pool of tar around itself for 30 sec when the first enemy approaches. All enemies have 50% reduced movement speed while in the area of effect. Limit 1. Trap will exist for 1 min.

Removes 1 Enrage and 1 Magic effect from an enemy target.

Successfully dispelling an effect generates 10 Focus.
Reduces all damage you and your pet take by 30% for 8 sec.
Interrupts spellcasting, preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Misdirects all threat you cause to the targeted party or raid member, beginning with your next attack within 30 sec and lasting for 8 sec.
Survival of the Fittest gains an additional charge.

Reduce the cooldown of Survival of the Fittest by 30 sec, and increase its duration by 2.0 sec.

Reduce the cooldown of Counter Shot and Muzzle by 2 sec.
Wildfire Bomb deals 10% increased damage.
When Tranquilizing Shot successfully dispels an effect or Muzzle interrupts a cast, gain 10 Focus.
Commands your pet to intimidate the target, stunning it for 5 sec.
Fires an explosive shot at your target. After 3 sec, the shot will explode, dealing 516,328 Fire damage to all enemies within 8 yds. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Fires a magical projectile, tethering the enemy and any other enemies within 5 yds for 10 sec, stunning them for 3 sec if they move more than 5 yds from the arrow.
Fires an explosion of bolts at all enemies in front of you, knocking them back, snaring them by 50% for 6 sec, and dealing 5,627 Physical damage.
The cooldown of Intimidation is reduced by 10 sec.

You and your pet have 5.0% increased attack speed.

This effect is increased by 100% if you do not have an active pet.
The damage of Explosive Shot is increased by 8%.
Critical strike chance increased by 4%.
Movement speed increased by 4%.

Targets stunned by Binding Shot, knocked back by High Explosive Trap, knocked up by Implosive Trap, incapacitated by Scatter Shot, or stunned by Intimidation deal 10% less damage to you for 8 sec after the effect ends.
You gain 5% more critical strike from critical strike sources.
Reduces the cooldowns of Aspect of the Eagle, Aspect of the Cheetah, and Aspect of the Turtle by 30 sec.
Feign Death and Aspect of the Turtle removes poison and disease effects from you.
Hurls a fire trap to the target location that explodes when an enemy approaches, causing 51,293 Fire damage and knocking all enemies up. Limit 1. Trap will exist for 1 min.

Your damage over time effects deal 10% increased damage.

This effect is increased by 50% on targets below 20% health.
Each time Sentinel deals damage to an enemy you gain an absorb shield equal to 1.0% of your maximum health, up to 10%.
When you apply Sentinel to a target not affected by Sentinel, you apply 1 additional stack.
Raptor Strike, Mongoose Bite and Wildfire Bomb deal 10% increased damage.
When you apply Sentinel on a target, you have a 15% chance to apply a second stack.
When Sentinel starts dealing damage, the target is snared by 40% for 3 sec.

Each time Sentinel deals damage to an enemy it has an up to 15% chance to generate 5 Focus.

Chances decrease with each additional Sentinel currently imploding applied to enemies.
Whenever a Sentinel deals damage, the cooldown of Coordinated Assault is reduced by 1 sec, up to 15 sec.
Multi-Shot and Butchery discharge arcane energy from all targets affected by your Sentinel, dealing 96,929 Arcane damage to up to 5 targets within 8 yds of your Sentinel targets.

All Sentinel debuffs implode when a target affected by more than 3 stacks of your Sentinel falls below 20% health.

This effect can only occur once every 15 sec per target.

Every 30 sec your next Wildfire Bomb launches a celestial arrow that conjures a 12 yd radius Lunar Storm at the target's location dealing 107,699 Arcane damage.
 
For the next 12 sec, a random enemy affected by Sentinel within your Lunar Storm gets struck for 100,968 Arcane damage every 0.4 sec. Any target struck by this effect takes 10% increased damage from you and your pet for 8 sec.
